property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: isDefault
property.description: A flag indicating if an entity is the default one.

property.name: quotePermissionGroups
property.description: A collection of permission groups associated with a quote.

property.name: isSuccessful
property.description: A boolean flag indicating if an operation completed successfully.

property.name: quotePermissionGroup
property.description: A group defining permissions for actions on a quote.

property.name: quotePermissionGroup
property.description: A group defining permissions for actions on a quote.

property.name: detail
property.description: A detailed error message providing more specific information about an issue.
